verses.verse: We <S%G3870><s%> then <S%G1161><s%>, as workers together <S%G4903><s%> with him, beseech <S%G3870><s%> you also <S%G2532><s%> that ye <S%G5209><s%> receive <S%G1209><s%> not <S%G3361><s%> the grace <S%G5485><s%> of God <S%G2316><s%> in <S%G1519><s%> vain <S%G2756><s%>.

(For <S%G1063><s%> he saith <S%G3004><s%>, I have heard <S%G1873><s%> thee <S%G4675><s%> in a time <S%G2540><s%> accepted <S%G1184><s%>, and <S%G2532><s%> in <S%G1722><s%> the day <S%G2250><s%> of salvation <S%G4991><s%> have I succoured <S%G997><s%> thee <S%G4671><s%>: behold <S%G2400><s%>, now <S%G3568><s%> is the accepted <S%G2144><s%> time <S%G2540><s%>; behold <S%G2400><s%>, now <S%G3568><s%> is the day <S%G2250><s%> of salvation <S%G4991><s%>.)

Giving <S%G1325><s%> no <S%G3367><s%> offence <S%G4349><s%> in <S%G1722><s%> any thing <S%G3367><s%>, that <S%G3363><s%> the ministry <S%G1248><s%> be <S%G3469><s%> not <S%G3363><s%> blamed <S%G3469><s%>:

But <S%G235><s%> in <S%G1722><s%> all <S%G3956><s%> things approving <S%G4921><s%> ourselves <S%G1438><s%> as <S%G5613><s%> the ministers <S%G1249><s%> of God <S%G2316><s%>, in <S%G1722><s%> much <S%G4183><s%> patience <S%G5281><s%>, in <S%G1722><s%> afflictions <S%G2347><s%>, in <S%G1722><s%> necessities <S%G318><s%>, in <S%G1722><s%> distresses <S%G4730><s%>, approving: Gr. commending

In <S%G1722><s%> stripes <S%G4127><s%>, in <S%G1722><s%> imprisonments <S%G5438><s%>, in <S%G1722><s%> tumults <S%G181><s%>, in <S%G1722><s%> labours <S%G2873><s%>, in <S%G1722><s%> watchings <S%G70><s%>, in <S%G1722><s%> fastings <S%G3521><s%>; in tumults: or, in tossings to and fro

By <S%G1722><s%> pureness <S%G54><s%>, by <S%G1722><s%> knowledge <S%G1108><s%>, by <S%G1722><s%> longsuffering <S%G3115><s%>, by <S%G1722><s%> kindness <S%G5544><s%>, by <S%G1722><s%> the Holy <S%G40><s%> Ghost <S%G4151><s%>, by <S%G1722><s%> love <S%G26><s%> unfeigned <S%G505><s%>,

By <S%G1722><s%> the word <S%G3056><s%> of truth <S%G225><s%>, by <S%G1722><s%> the power <S%G1411><s%> of God <S%G2316><s%>, by <S%G1223><s%> the armour <S%G3696><s%> of righteousness <S%G1343><s%> on the right hand <S%G1188><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> on the left <S%G710><s%>,

By <S%G1223><s%> honour <S%G1391><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> dishonour <S%G819><s%>, by <S%G1223><s%> evil report <S%G1426><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> good report <S%G2162><s%>: as <S%G5613><s%> deceivers <S%G4108><s%>, and <S%G2532><s%> yet true <S%G227><s%>;

As <S%G5613><s%> unknown <S%G50><s%>, and <S%G2532><s%> yet well known <S%G1921><s%>; as <S%G5613><s%> dying <S%G599><s%>, and <S%G2532><s%>, behold <S%G2400><s%>, we live <S%G2198><s%>; as <S%G5613><s%> chastened <S%G3811><s%>, and <S%G2532><s%> not <S%G3361><s%> killed <S%G2289><s%>;

As <S%G5613><s%> sorrowful <S%G3076><s%>, yet <S%G1161><s%> alway <S%G104><s%> rejoicing <S%G5463><s%>; as <S%G5613><s%> poor <S%G4434><s%>, yet <S%G1161><s%> making <S%G4148><s%> many <S%G4183><s%> rich <S%G4148><s%>; as <S%G5613><s%> having <S%G2192><s%> nothing <S%G3367><s%>, and <S%G2532><s%> yet possessing <S%G2722><s%> all things <S%G3956><s%>.
O ye Corinthians <S%G2881><s%>, our <S%G2257><s%> mouth <S%G4750><s%> is open <S%G455><s%> unto <S%G4314><s%> you <S%G5209><s%>, our <S%G2257><s%> heart <S%G2588><s%> is enlarged <S%G4115><s%>.

Ye are <S%G4729><s%> not <S%G3756><s%> straitened <S%G4729><s%> in <S%G1722><s%> us <S%G2254><s%>, but <S%G1161><s%> ye are straitened <S%G4729><s%> in <S%G1722><s%> your own <S%G5216><s%> bowels <S%G4698><s%>.

Now <S%G1161><s%> for a recompence <S%G489><s%> in the same <S%G846><s%>, (I speak <S%G3004><s%> as <S%G5613><s%> unto my children <S%G5043><s%>,) be <S%G4115><s%> ye <S%G5210><s%> also <S%G2532><s%> enlarged <S%G4115><s%>.

Be ye <S%G1096><s%> not <S%G3361><s%> unequally yoked together <S%G2086><s%> with unbelievers <S%G571><s%>: for <S%G1063><s%> what <S%G5101><s%> fellowship <S%G3352><s%> hath righteousness <S%G1343><s%> with <S%G2532><s%> unrighteousness <S%G458><s%>? and <S%G1161><s%> what <S%G5101><s%> communion <S%G2842><s%> hath light <S%G5457><s%> with <S%G4314><s%> darkness <S%G4655><s%>?

And <S%G1161><s%> what <S%G5101><s%> concord <S%G4857><s%> hath Christ <S%G5547><s%> with <S%G4314><s%> Belial <S%G955><s%>? or <S%G2228><s%> what <S%G5101><s%> part <S%G3310><s%> hath he that believeth <S%G4103><s%> with <S%G3326><s%> an infidel <S%G571><s%>?

And <S%G1161><s%> what <S%G5101><s%> agreement <S%G4783><s%> hath the temple <S%G3485><s%> of God <S%G2316><s%> with <S%G3326><s%> idols <S%G1497><s%>? for <S%G1063><s%> ye <S%G5210><s%> are <S%G2075><s%> the temple <S%G3485><s%> of the living <S%G2198><s%> God <S%G2316><s%>; as <S%G2531><s%> God <S%G2316><s%> hath said <S%G2036><s%>, <S%G3754><s%> I will dwell <S%G1774><s%> in <S%G1722><s%> them <S%G846><s%>, and <S%G2532><s%> walk in <S%G1704><s%> them; and <S%G2532><s%> I will be <S%G2071><s%> their <S%G846><s%> God <S%G2316><s%>, and <S%G2532><s%> they <S%G846><s%> shall be <S%G2071><s%> my <S%G3427><s%> people <S%G2992><s%>.

Wherefore <S%G1352><s%> come out <S%G1831><s%> from <S%G1537><s%> among <S%G3319><s%> them <S%G846><s%>, and <S%G2532><s%> be ye separate <S%G873><s%>, saith <S%G3004><s%> the Lord <S%G2962><s%>, and <S%G2532><s%> touch <S%G680><s%> not <S%G3361><s%> the unclean <S%G169><s%> thing; and <S%G2504><s%> I will receive <S%G1523><s%> you <S%G5209><s%>,

And <S%G2532><s%> will be <S%G2071><s%> <S%G1519><s%> a Father <S%G3962><s%> unto you <S%G5213><s%>, and <S%G2532><s%> ye <S%G5210><s%> shall be <S%G2071><s%> my <S%G3427><s%> sons <S%G5207><s%> <S%G1519><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> daughters <S%G2364><s%>, saith <S%G3004><s%> the Lord <S%G2962><s%> Almighty <S%G3841><s%>.
